title: Tron: Ares director says his film is hopeful about AI
description: Tron: Ares director Joachim Rønning has told RTÉ Entertainment that it was important for the new sci-fi thriller to share the idea that artificial intelligence "can help advance humanity".
content:

title: A mystery CEO and billions in sales: Is China buying banned Nvidia chips?
description: On a humid June night last year, Jensen Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, held court with several of his company’s major Asian customers at a bar with sweeping views of Taipei, Taiwan. They stood and toasted the booming artificial intelligence industry. Next to the Nvidia chief was a woman named Huang Le, or Alice Huang, […]
content:

title: The Bold Claim That AGI And AI Superintelligence Will Radically Fragment Society
description: Worries are that after AI becomes artificial general intelligence (AGI), the world will become hopelessly fragmented. Here's the inside scoop on this big concern.
content: In today’s column, I examine a thought-provoking theory that once AI becomes AGI (artificial general intelligence) or ASI (artificial superintelligence), humanity will fragment into all sorts of radical factions on a massive scale. Why would this hap... [9153 chars]

title: Judiciary should adapt to challenges posed by data, AI: SC judges
description: INDORE, Oct 11: The judiciary must adapt to the rapidly changing technological landscape, said four Supreme Court judges on Saturday, highlighting the emerging legal challenges linked to data, artificial intelligence (AI) and innovation. They were speaking at the International Colloquium on the theme “Evolving Horizons: Navigating Complexity and Innovation in Commercial and Arbitration Law in the Digital World” held in Indore. In his inaugural address, Justice Jitendra Kumar Maheshwari of the top court said that the goal of the judiciary […]
content:

title: MIER College conducts AI Workshops
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 11: MIER College of Education (Autonomous), Jammu in collaboration with the Commonwealth of Learning (COL), Canada, successfully organised two intensive workshops on Artificial Intelligence (AI) integration in higher education. Dr. Kaushal Kumar Bhagat, Assistant Professor at the Advanced Technology Development Centre and Vice Chairman of Centre for Teaching Learning and Virtual Skilling at IIT Kharagpur was resource person for both workshops. The first workshop on ‘Institutional AI Policy for Teaching, Learning and Research’ brought together faculty […]
